solution_line_template: Jasmine's shortest book is {shortest_book_fraction} * {longest_book_pages} pages = <<{shortest_book_fraction}*{longest_book_pages}={shortest_book_pages}>>{shortest_book_pages} pages long.
The middle book is {middle_book_multiplier} * {shortest_book_pages} pages = <<{middle_book_multiplier}*{shortest_book_pages}={middle_book_pages}>>{middle_book_pages} pages long.
